welcome.title: Track Your Cycle Easily
welcome.description: Log your period days, moods, and energy levels.

reminders.title: Little Reminders for You
reminders.description: Chocolate time? Water break? I'm here for you.

privacy.title: Your Data Stays with You
privacy.description: All information is safely stored on your device, never shared.

lastPeriod.title: Select Last Period Start üå∏
lastPeriod.description: Choose the day your last period started to calculate your cycle.

periodLength.title: Select Period Length ‚è≥
periodLength.description: How many days does your period usually last? (Average: 5 days)

cycleLength.title: Select Cycle Length üîÑ
cycleLength.description: How many days is your cycle usually? (Average: 28 days)

dailyLog.title: {{date}} Log üíï
dailyLog.subtitle: How are you feeling?

symptoms.title: My Symptoms ü©∫
symptoms.longPressHint: Tip: Long press a symptom to see its description

notes.title: My Notes üìù
notes.placeholder: How was your day? Leave a note for yourself üíï

dailyLog.saveError: At least one field must be filled!

emptyState.title: Not Enough Data Yet
emptyState.description: At least 2 cycle records are required to see statistics. Keep tracking your cycles! üå∏

prediction.title: üéØ Prediction System
prediction.description: Prediction accuracy will improve as you track your cycles.
prediction.calculating: Calculating prediction accuracy for last {{count}} cycles...

privacy.dataSecurityDescription: All your data is securely stored on your device and never shared with anyone.

data.deleteDescription: Be careful - this cannot be undone!
data.exportConfirm: All your data will be exported in JSON format. Do you want to continue?
data.importConfirm: You can import your data by selecting a JSON file.
data.deleteConfirm: This action cannot be undone! All your cycle records, logs, and settings will be deleted.
data.featureSoon: This feature will be added soon.

about.medicalDescription: This app is not a substitute for medical advice.
about.privacyPolicyText: CycleMateApp stores all your data on your device and never shares it with any third parties. Your data is completely private and only accessible by you.

menstrual.title: Menstrual Phase (Period)
menstrual.description: The uterine lining (endometrium) is shedding. Your body is preparing for a new cycle.

follicular.title: Follicular Phase (Energy Rising)
follicular.description: Follicles are developing in the ovaries, endometrium is thickening. Energy and motivation are increasing.

ovulation.title: Ovulation Phase (Peak Fertility)
ovulation.description: Egg is released. Energy, libido, and social skills are at their peak.

luteal.title: Luteal Phase (Calming Period)
luteal.description: Corpus luteum secretes progesterone. PMS symptoms may begin in the late phase.

permission.title: Notification Permission
permission.message: You need to grant notification permission to receive reminders.

dailyLog.title: Daily Reminder
dailyLog.body: Log your day! üìñ How are you feeling today?

periodReminder.title: Period Reminder
periodReminder.body: Your period is approaching üå∏ You can prepare.

waterReminder.title: Water Reminder
waterReminder.body: Time to drink water! üíß Take care of yourself.

motivation.title: Good morning!
motivation.body: Today is going to be a great day! üåû Stay positive!
